user_prompt: From 'If I charge my phone, it will have power' can we infer 'If I charge my phone and it has a dead battery, it will have power'?
system_prompt: Answer only with 'yes' or 'no' and nothing else.

responses.content:
Looking at this logically:

The original statement: "If I charge my phone, it will have power" can be written as:
- If P, then Q

The proposed inference: "If I charge my phone and it has a dead battery, it will have power" can be written as:
- If (P and R), then Q

This is an instance of strengthening the antecedent. If P is sufficient for Q, then P combined with any additional condition R is also sufficient for Q. This is a valid logical inference.

**Yes**
